import React from 'react' import technolgy from '../../static/Images/tehnolgy.jpg' import { useStateValue } from "../../context/StateProvider"; const Profile = ({flag, data }) => { console.log(data); const [{ details }, dispatch] = useStateValue(); return ( <> {/*
*/}
{data && data.map((details)=>(
{details.name}{details.name}

{details.branch}

{details.passout_year} Pass out {details.Job_offer} job offer Department
) )}
{/*
*/} ) } export default Profile
